member.name: M:EisenhowerMatrixApp.Model.ITodoItemDao.Add(EisenhowerMatrixApp.Model.TodoItem)
member.summary: Adds a new object to the database and sets the new ID.
member.param: A new object, with ID not yet set (null).

member.name: M:EisenhowerMatrixApp.Model.ITodoItemDao.Update(EisenhowerMatrixApp.Model.TodoItem)
member.summary: Updates existing object's data in the database.
member.param: An object from the database, with ID already set.

member.name: M:EisenhowerMatrixApp.Model.ITodoItemDao.Get(System.Int32)
member.returns: An object with a given ID, or null if not found.

member.name: M:EisenhowerMatrixApp.Model.ITodoItemDao.GetAll
member.returns: List of all objects of this type in the database.
